def: dealer name=@DEALER.NAME@ ! v4l2_tegra_encoder name=encoder fps=@APP.FPS@ br=@APP.BITRATE_KBPS@ preset=ultrafast

params.@DEALER.NAME@.def: dup name=dup_20mp_stereo ! pcuda_remapper name=remapper debalgo=malvar debayer=I420 sh=0 rgb_gain=@APP.RGB_GAIN@ gamma=2.4 ho=1 edge_r="0.2" s=@APP.SIZE@ n_vstreams=@APP.N_STREAMS@
dup name=dup_20mp_stereo ! pcuda_remapper name=remapper debalgo=linear debayer=I420 sh=10 rgb_gain=@APP.RGB_GAIN@ gamma=2.4 ho=1 edge_r="0.2" s=@APP.SIZE@ n_vstreams=@APP.N_STREAMS@
params.mux.vin0: v4l2_capture name=capture s=@APP.CAM0@ fmt=BA10 ae_target=@V4L2.AE_TARGET@ ae_cycle=@APP.FPS@ cudamem=@V4L2.CUDAMEM@
params.mux.vin1: v4l2_capture name=capture s=@APP.CAM1@ fmt=BA10 ae_target=@V4L2.AE_TARGET@ ae_cycle=@APP.FPS@ cudamem=@V4L2.CUDAMEM@
